item.title: About me
item.description: Hei! I am a master student in artificial intelligence at the University of Technology Sydney. I’m passionate about machine learning, deep learning, and computer vision. Currently, I’m working on my thesis project, which focuses on developing a novel deep learning model for neuron segmentation for connectomics. Originally from Svalbard, I have always been fascinated by technology and understanding the human brain. I have a bachelor’s degree in cognitive science from the University of Bergen, where I specialized in computer science.
